name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF NUTRITION AND AGING SERVICES PROGRAMS
sampleDescriptions: funding for senior nutrition programs and other seniors' programs; Medicare beneficiary issues
funding for senior nutrition programs and other seniors' programs; Medicare beneficiary issues
Discussed Medicare Part D drug pricing issues with Senate and House staff.
Lobbied both House and Senate on increasing appropriations for the Older Americans Act nutrition programs, commonly known as congregate and home-delivered meals.
Lobbied House and Senate on the pending Older Americans Act reauthorization, which has not yet been introduced in either chamber.
